attributes.action: Rid Samsung Of The "One Ui/Pie" Update
attributes.additional_details: Here is a link to a detailed review I found of a poor soul who went through the same struggle we did on that horrible morn.
attributes.background:
The new Samsung update is so horrible I want to destroy my phone.

We need to do something about this and Samsung doesn't seem to care about the people who want to downgrade.

Lets get this to parliament.
